short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you identify and ditch the companies that donate to red candidates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ditch Red is a browser extension that helps users make informed decisions about their online interactions. The extension:

- Automatically identifies websites of companies that supported the extreme right in the 2024 election based on a publicly maintained list
- Shows a clear visual indicator when visiting listed domains (red icon)
- Updates automatically from our public GitHub repository
- Respects user privacy - no data collection or tracking

Key Features:
- Simple, unobtrusive interface
- Real-time domain checking
- Transparent, open-source code
- No personal data collection
- Works offline with a cached list
